alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Southern Fairfield; Southern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 10:53PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Fairfield, central Middlesex and southeastern New Haven Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1053 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Stratford to near Norwalk. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, New Haven, Norwalk, Milford, Shelton, Guilford, Chester, Fairfield, Hamden, Stratford, Trumbull, Branford, Westport, North Haven and Darien. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Southern Fairfield; Southern New Haven
